profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.
products: Solid PVC Slatwall, trim, hooks, baskets shelves from HandiWall
services:
One Day Garage Flooring,

Painting and just about all other design and interior renovation of garages and closets
brands: HandiWall, Contur Cabinets, Sherwin Williams Polyaspartic
specialities: In addition to the services noted above, we specialize in customized, made to measure, wall and ceiling storage to maximize available storage space.
project_minimum: We don’t work on minimums or maximums, we focus on what’s right and best for you and your family

profile:
Your home is where you have built memories of a lifetime and cherished every moment with your loved ones. We understand the thought of moving is overwhelming for most people, never mind all the details involved. Many find it stressful to sort through the treasures accumulated over many years and it can be challenging to make decisions about what to bring to a new, less cluttered space. 

Organized Transitions is a team of professional organizers with a compassionate approach in developing a customized plan for each family. Our full range of services and expertise enables us to offer seamless transitions to our clients. From downsizing and relocation to estate clear outs and auction management, we make your move an easy one – from Ancaster, Burlington, Dundas, Grimsby, Hamilton, Mississauga, Oakville, and surrounding areas.

In business since 2010, we have established a professional team and network of resources to complement our services in order to provide you with the highest quality experience.  We understand every family and every circumstance requires an individualized approach.  We would be happy to meet with you for a FREE no-obligation consultation to discuss your upcoming transition.  We can be reached by phone (905-599-1816), email (info@organizedtransitions.ca), or through the contact form on our website (www.organizedtransitions.ca/contact).

NOTE: We are continuing to offer our services through the COVID-19 pandemic, respecting all local health guidelines and the safety of our clients and team.
